description: The secure sandbox implementation extends the core Jint engine.
The frontend script editor requires the backend CRUD API to be available for saving and loading scripts.
mitigation_plan: Develop against a mocked API contract (Swagger/OpenAPI) until the backend API is deployed to staging.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks all frontend development for script management.

description: The 3-pane preview UI requires the backend preview API to function.
mitigation_plan: Define and agree on the API contract for success and all error types (timeout, runtime, etc.) before implementation begins.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks development of the interactive preview feature.
